'Purity Factories Limited' is a food processing company based in St. John's,
Newfoundland.

Founded in 1924 by C. C. Pratt, A. E. Hickman, and W. R. Goobie, Purity is known
for its cream crackers, Peppermint Nobs, Candy Kisses, and flavoured syrups. The
company also makes several varieties of hard bread (hardtack), a staple of the
Newfoundland diet formerly used by fishermen as a bread substitute and as an
ingredient in fish and brewis. [http://www.purity.nf.ca/index.html "Purity
Factories...Our History"] at Purity Factories website
